questions.question: How confident are you about choosing the right stream after 10th?

options.text: Very confident—I know exactly which stream fits me best.
Confident—I've researched my options thoroughly.
Somewhat confident—I have a preferred stream but still have some doubts.
Moderately confident—I'm considering 2-3 streams seriously.
Neutral—I could see myself in several different streams.
Slightly unsure—I'm leaning one way but have significant doubts.
Confused—I keep going back and forth between options.
Very uncertain—I don't know which stream would be best for me.
Anxious—I'm afraid of making the wrong choice.
